data.name: Computer Mechanic Simulator 2019
data.detailed_description:
Computer Mechanic Simulator is a great simulator where you can build your top-end computer. It provides a variety of different processors, graphics cards, motherboards and other parts to fit the Assembly for every taste. This program will teach you to understand the structure of the computer, learn more about the processes that occur in it, in order to be able to assemble and disassemble the computer, for only 1.99$, in the future you will save hundreds $! after all, you no longer have to use the services or buy disgusting Assembly.
This simulator presents the physics of wires that can bend and unbend, as in real life.
After you build your PC, you can install the OS on it and play interesting games from the built-in library!
Advantages Of Computer Mechanic Simulator:
* Completely original simulator
* Physics of computer parts
* physics of wires
* OS and built-in games
* Low price

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP,7,8,8.1,10
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 550
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6000
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 480/GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
